meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #3986.

td.p: Allyson Lieberman, a 12-year-old from Whitmore Lake, Michigan
Lauren Kutner, an 11-year-old from Newtown, Pennsylvania
Nick Dnistrian, an 11-year-old from Webster, New York

tr.td: CONTINENTS BY COUNTRIES
CHRISTMAS PRESENTS
CARTOON CHARACTERS
LET'S GET COOKING!
WINTER BREAK
FAMILIAR PHRASES

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_6_4', 'clue_DJ_6_4_stuck', '(Nick: What is Battleship?)
(Allyson: What is Simon Says?)
[Allyson\'s response was at first accepted as correct.]
(Alex [prior to the FJ! round] Because I don\'t know the difference
between the games [*]
and Simon Says.
I thought it was the same thing, and she was incorrect, because she responded, "What is Simon Says?")

Simon

NickAllyson
Triple Stumper
')
